Zero nods slightly.

Zero: "Ive heard of them.. but not in a very long time... people from 
where I came from never played games that often... not with the 
problems we had there. But let us play seek and found shall we?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> "Seek and found and Tag" said with a big smile "Don't you heard 
about 
> them? Don't worry... I can teach you how play them..."
> 
>

> > Zero looks to Trinity and one eye widens a bit, these games... he 
> had

> from

Slowly
